com.collabnet.ccf.core.transformer
Class XsltProcessor

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.Component
      com.collabnet.ccf.core.transformer.XsltProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.openadaptor.core.IComponent, org.openadaptor.core.IDataProcessor, org.openadaptor.core.jmx.Administrable
public class XsltProcessor
extends org.openadaptor.core.Component
implements org.openadaptor.core.IDataProcessor

This component is very similar to the standard openAdaptor XSLT processor but additionally allows to output XML documents encoded as Dom4J instances. This implies that it will only work with XSLT files that will generate valid XML output (a restriction the standard openAdaptor XSLT processor does not have).

Author:
jnicolai

loadXSLT

private javax.xml.transform.Transformer loadXSLT(java.lang.String xsltFile)
Trys to load the XSLT from the file defined in the properties (will also try to find the file on the classpath if it can).

Throws:
org.openadaptor.core.exception.ValidationException - if the XSLT file is not defined in the properties, the file cannot be found or there was an error parsing it
